mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, QNA.* FROM ( SELECT QC.QNA_COMMENT_NO, QC.UNO, QC.QNA_BNO, QC.QNA_COMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN QC.QNA_COMMENT_GROUP = 0 THEN QC.QNA_COMMENT_NO ELSE QC.QNA_COMMENT_GROUP END AS QNA_COMMENT_GROUP, QC.QNA_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE, QC.QNA_COMMENT_REGDATE, QC.QNA_COMMENT_UPDATE, U.NICKNAME FROM QNA_COMMENT QC JOIN USERINFO U ON QC.UNO = U.UNO WHERE QC.QNA_BNO=#{qnaBno} ORDER BY CASE WHEN QC.QNA_COMMENT_GROUP = 0 THEN QC.QNA_COMMENT_NO ELSE QC.QNA_COMMENT_GROUP END, QC.QNA_COMMENT_NO ) QNA ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_COMMENT (QNA_COMMENT_NO, QNA_BNO, UNO, QNA_COMMENT_CONTENT, QNA_COMMENT_GROUP, QNA_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO) VALUES (QNA_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qnaBno}, #{uno}, #{qnaCommentContent}, #{qnaCommentGroup}, #{uno})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_COMMENT SET QNA_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE = 2, QNA_COMMENT_UPDATE= SYSDATE, QNA_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO = #{uno} WHERE QNA_COMMENT_NO = #{qnaCommentNo} AND #{userStatus} = 1 AND QNA_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE = 1
